mapper.update: update delivery_place set mg_ID = #{mgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dep_Name = #{depName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province_Name = #{provinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city_Name = #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mg_Name = #{mgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dep_Tel = #{depTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dep_Addr = #{depAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Comments = #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where dep_ID = #{depId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select dep_ID, mg_ID, dep_Name, province_Name, city_Name, mg_Name, dep_Tel, dep_Addr, Comments from delivery_place where dep_ID = #{depId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
